articles.title: 7-Eleven to close over 400 stores in North America - NPR
articles.description: The ubiquitous convenience store owed its recent revenue drops to inflation, declining cigarette sales and a shift in palates toward fresh food and specialty drinks.
articles.content:
Several hundred 7-Eleven stores across North America are closing, the convenience store chain announced.
The companys CEO reported in an earnings call on Thursday held by Tokyo-based parent company … [+1952 chars]
